Title: Relates to the use of artificial intelligence for utilization review
Summary: Provides for notice requirements where an insurer authorized to write accident and health insurance in this state, a corporation organized pursuant to article forty-three of this chapter, or a health maintenance organization certified pursuant to article forty-four of the public health law uses artificial intelligence-based algorithms in the utilization review process.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the use of artificial intelligence for utilization review
